mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(POST_NUM, TITLE, WRITER, REG_DATE, VIEWS, CONTENT, COMMENT_COUNT, NOTICE) VALUES(POST_NUM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{writer}, sysdate, 0, #{content}, 0, #{notice})
